ideas.title: Multi-Platform Sell-Through
ideas.description: Create a unified view that calculates 'True Sell-Through' by combining views/downloads from Thangs with actual sales on Etsy to verify which designs translate to physical demand.

ideas.title: Customer Sentiment AI
ideas.description: Scrape Etsy reviews and Thangs comments weekly. Use Gemini/Claude to summarize 'Feature Requests' and 'Common Complaints' for product iteration.

ideas.title: Auto-Gallery Update
ideas.description: When a new 'Make' is posted on Thangs or a photo review on Etsy, automatically save the image to a 'Social Proof' folder for Instagram reposting.
